name: GiDon Duet
description:
Soar through intergalactic obstacle courses as the intrepid shooting star: grasp for the heavens as you come to learn of yourself and your universe, and let familiarity breed perfection. Don't stop there though–use the course editor to create galaxies of your own and share them with the world. Experience the joy of gliding through space to the euphoric beat of your own rhythm.

[FEATURING]

  • a modest collection of strongly designed courses
  • an existential narrative that is largely superfluous
  • no chirpy mascots or gun-toting musclemen
  • an upbeat but tranquil atmosphere
  • an expressive, empowering course designer (with sharing)
  • ∞ hours of playtime!

☆☆ FEATURING [ERR:NotANumber]% MORE AWESOME THAN GiDON DONUT! JOIN THE FUN ☆☆

Available for Windows, Mac, and Linux
